thoughts: Wonders how {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} ended up here
Traipses through the muck with a disgusted look on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} face
Growls at the shadows
Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} housefolk are okay
Is tougher than {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} look
Is failing to get along with the Clanborn cats
Is getting along surprisingly well with the CLanborn cats
Is a quick learner
Isn't as soft as other cats think
Mourns how soft {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} coat used to be
Feels truly hungry for the first time
Can't seem to figure out the shadowy wastes
Gets lost in the endless black and yowls for hours before giving up
Thinks about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} housefolk
Yearns for their old home
Wonders who the starry-pelted cats are
Hisses at every movement
Is trying to remember what food tastes like
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} had caught the fish in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} neighbor's pond before {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} died
Is trying to figure out how {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} housefolk would have gotten the mud out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} fur
Hates being constantly damp with muck
